characterDescription:
Ladent is an ardent in the employ of Highprince Dalinar Kholin.
During the warcamp inspection that Dalinar and his son, Adolin, performed, he was supposed to send a messenger to the Fifth Battalion.
Ladent was identified by Navani as one among several ardents (including Rushu and Kadash) who turned she and Dalinar down with regard to uniting them in marriage.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is short, bald and bearded. While wearing thick, blue-grey layered robes from which his hands barely extend, the effect was of a crab who was too small for its shell. While it looked terribly hot, he didn't seem to mind.
